S04n539:2: ayaṃ bhadanta bhagavansuvarṇaprabhāsottamaḥ sūtrendrarāja etarhi cānāgate'dhvani yatra grāme vā nagare vā nigame vā janapade vāraṇyapradeśe vā girikandare vā rājakule vopasaṃkramiṣyati |
S04n539:4: yatra yatra bhagavanpṛthivīpradeśe tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣo ṛjukāyagatasya dharmāsanaprajñaptaṃ bhaviṣyati |
S04n539:5: yatra yatrāsane dharmabhāṇako niṣadyemaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamaṃ sūtrendrarājaṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati |
S04n539:6: tatrāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavandṛḍhā pṛthivīdevatā teṣu pṛthivīpradeśeṣvāgamiṣyāmi |
S04n539:7: atra dharmāsanagato'smyadṛśyamānenātmabhāvenottamāṅgena ca tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣoḥ pādatalau pratisaṃhariṣyāmi |
S04n539:10: ātmānaṃ ca saṃtarpayitvā pratimānayitvā saṃpraharṣayitvemamaṣṭaṣaṣṭiyojanasahasrāṇi pṛthivīskandhamātmānaṃ cānena dharmaśravaṇena dharmāmṛtarasena yāvadvajramayaṃ pṛthivītalamupādāya pṛthivīrasenavivardhayiṣyāmi saṃpratimānayiṣyāmi paripūrayiṣyāmi |
S04n539:11: uparitaścemaṃ samudraparyantaṃ pṛthivītalamupādāya pṛthivīmaṇḍalaṃ snigdhena pṛthivīrasena snehayiṣyāmi |
S04n539:15: gandhatarāṇi snigdhatarāṇyāsvadanīyāni darśanīyatarāṇi mahottarāṇi ca bhaviṣyanti |
S04n539:16: te ca sattvāstāni pānabhojanāni nānāvidhānyupabhuktvā āyurbalavarṇendriyāṇi vivardhayiṣyanti |
S04n539:17: tejobalavarṇarūpasamanvāuatāśca bhūtvā nānāvidhāni pṛthivīgatānyanekāni nānākāryaśatasahasrāṇi kariṣyantyutthāsyanti vyāpayiṣyanti |
S04n539:19: tena hetunā bhadanta bhagavansarvajambudvīpaḥ kṣemaśca bhaviṣyati |
S04n539:24: asya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasyārthāya teṣāṃ sūtrendradhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānaṃ dharmāsanagatānāmantikamupasaṃkrameyuḥ |
S04n539:25: upasaṃkramitvā tāni prasannacittāni sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya tāndharmabhāṇakānadhyeṣayeyusya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya prakāśataḥ |
S04n539:26: ahaṃ dṛḍhā pṛthivīdevatā saparivāraujasvitarā ca bhaviṣyāmi |
S04n539:27: tena bhadanta bhagavaṃścāsmākaṃ kāye mahābalavī ryasthāmasaṃjanitaṃ bhaviṣyati |
S04n539:29: mayi ca bhadanta bhagavandṛḍhāyāṃ pṛthivīdevatāyāmanena dharmāmṛtarasena saṃtarpitāyāṃ mahātejobalavīryasthāmavegapratilabdhāyāmiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī saptayojanasāhasrikāyaṃ jambudvīpo mahatā pṛthivīrasena vivardhayiṣyati |
S04n539:31: imāni ca bhadanta bhagana sarvasattvāni pṛthivīsaṃniśritāni vṛddhivirūḍhivaipulyatāṃ ca gamiṣyanti |
S04n539:33: mahanti ca bhūtvā sarvasattvāni pṛthivīgatāni nānopabhogaparibhogānyupabhokṣyanti sukhāni cānubhaviṣyanti |
S04n539:34: tāni ca sarvāṇi nānāvicitrānnapānabhojyavastraśayanāsanavasanabhavanavimānodyānanadīpuṣkariṇyutsarohradataḍāgādīnīmānyevaṃrūpāṇi nānāvidhānyupakaraṇasukhāni pṛthivīsaṃsthitāni pṛthivyāṃ prādurbhūtāni pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhitānyupabhujantu |
S04n539:35: tena bhadanta bhagavanhetunā sarvasattvairasmākaṃ kṛtajñatā kartavyā |
S04n539:36: avaśyamayaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamaḥ sūtrendrarājaḥ satkṛtya śrotavyaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ |
S04n539:37: yadā ca bhadanta bhagavaṃste sarve sattvā nānākulebhyo nānāgṛhebhyo niṣkrameyusteṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmupasakramaṇāya |
S04n539:39: śrutvā ca punareva te sattvāḥ svakasvakeṣu nānākuleṣu gṛhagrāmanagaranigameṣu praviṣṭāḥ svagṛhagatāṃ paraspareṇaivaṃ kathayeyuḥ |
S04n539:45: tena ca nānāgṛhagatā bhūtvā teṣāṃ sattvānāmitaḥ suvarṇaprabhāsottamātsūtrendrarājādantaśa ekadṛṣṭāntamapyārocayeyurantaśa ekaparivartaṃ vā ekapūrvayogaṃ vāntaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmantaśa ekapadamapi suvarṇaprabhāsottamātsūtrendrarājādanyeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃśrāvayeyurantaśaḥ suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya nāmadheyamapi pareṣāṃ sattvānā saṃśrāvayeyuḥ |
S04n539:46: yatra yatra bhadanta bhagavaṃstāni nānāvidhāni sattvāni nānāvidheṣu pṛthivīpradeśaṣvimānyevaṃrūpāṇi nānāvidhāni sūtrāntahetūni paraspareṇārocayeyuḥ saṃśrāvayeyuśca |
S04n539:48: sarve te bhadanta bhagavanpṛthivīpradeśā ojasvitarāśca bhaviṣyanti |
S04n539:50: sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ teṣu teṣu pṛthivīpradeśeṣu nānāvidhāni pṛthivīrasāni sarvopakaraṇāni bhūyiṣṭhataramutpatsyante vivardhayiṣyante vaipulyatāṃ gamiṣyanti |
S04n539:51: sarvāṇi tāni sattvāni mahādhanāni mahābhogāni ca dānādhimuktāni ca bhaviṣyanti |
S04n539:54: ye kecitpṛthivīdevate sattvā itaḥ suvarṇaprabhāsottamātsūtrendrarājādantaśa ekapadamapi śṛṇuyuste ta ito manuṣyalokāccavitvā trayastriṃśatsu devanikāyeṣvanyatarānyatareṣu devanikāyeṣūpapatsyante |
S04n539:55: ye kecitpṛthivī devate sattvā asya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājāsyārthāya tāni sthānāni samalaṃkurvīrannantaśa ekacchatraṃ vā ekadūṣyaṃ vā samalaṃkṛtāni ca devatāsthānāni |
S04n539:56: teṣu saptasu kāmāvacareṣu devanikāyeṣu saptaratnamayāni divyāni vimānāni sarvālaṃkārasamalaṃkṛtāni saṃsthāsyanti te sattvā ito manuṣyalokāccyāvitvā teṣu saptaratnamayeṣu divyavimāneṣūpapatsyante |
S04n539:57: te caikaikasminpṛthivīdevate saptaratnamaye divyavimāne saptavarā anupapatsyante acintyāni divyāni sukhāni pratyanubhaviṣyanti ||
S04n539:59: tenāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavandṛḍhā pṛthivīdevatā tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣordharmāsanagatasya teṣu pṛthivīpradeśeṣvavāsiṣyāmi |
S04n539:60: adṛśyamānenātmabhāvena tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣoruttamāṅgena pādatalau pratisaṃhariṣyāmi |
S04n539:61: yathāpyayaṃ suvarṇaprabhasottamaḥ sūtrendrarājasteṣāṃ buddhasahasrāvaruptakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya ciraṃ jambudvīpe pracaret |
